system.description: Once a day, A Kroot Shaper may target themselves and WP Bonus number of willing Kroot and give them +2 to Melee Damage Rolls for WP Bonus Rounds. This ability can also target willing Non-Kroot, but character must first pass a +0 Willpower Test to apply the benefit to non-Kroot target.
